item.title: Santa's Message
item.description: Description It’s almost that time of the year and Santa needs to prepare himself for the busiest of nights. He surely can’t do it alone so he has to comunicate with his elfs and that’s where you come in! Message We have intercepted this messages from one of Santa’s elfs, Evilio. We suspect there is something hidden in it. Download verification MD5 hash for integrity 9b4f299aa4006708870123ff926178ff Now it’s up to you to find out what Evilio meant with this message… If you find it please let us know ASAP, we don’t have much time.
